name: PT Dam Korporindo Digital
description: We are an  IT and Financial Technology Platform Company, focusing on Banks, Mobile Application for payment and ecommerce industry. Our portfolio are, Mandiri ecash, Jtrust Bank emoney, OCBC NISP emoney, Panin Bank emoney.  For payment method we engage through ecash platform with Midtrans, ipay88, Doku, fastpay, Tokopedia, Bukalapak, Blibli, Grab, KFC, XXI, and many more. We also supported by Mcash Group who own the largest Point of Sales and Retail Chain to distribute digital product such as Pulsa (telephone credit), Bill payment and e-vouchers (resto, e-tickets), to enrich our product and services to our client, as a switching company.
